title: I am trying to find out any information on the \Customs House\" that was in Wilmington before 1912.  I own floor tile that was supposed to have come out of it and would like more information about the building.  It could have been called something else.  Thanks!!!"
text:
There's information about the Customs Houses in Wilmington at this
link: http://www.wingnet.org/rtw/SUMWPS018.HTM



You might have to scroll down a bit to find the information.



I'm going to ask  to do a full answer on this question
when he has time.
